original: 祖父荀淑知名當世，號神君。叔父荀爽領袖士人，三公高位。彧少有才名，南陽名士何顒曾讚其為「王佐之才」。
text: Grandfather Xun Shu is well-known in the world, and he is called God King. Uncle Xun Shuang is a leader and scholar, and has a high position of three males. Yu has few talents, and Nanyang celebrity He Yong once praised him as "Wang Zuo's talent."
